RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CCY_CODE , CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT '*.*', 'ANY CCY' FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN ORDER BY CCY_CODE
SELECT DISTINCT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ANY CUSTOMER' FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER
SELECT DISTINCT CONTRACT_REF_NO,CUSTOM_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT WHERE BRANCH = ? UNION SELECT 'ALL','ANY CONTRACT' FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT
SELECT DISTINCT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ANY CUSTOMER' FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER
SELECT CCY_CODE , CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' ORDER BY CCY_CODE

SELECT FIELD_NAME, FIELD_DESC FROM OLTMS_STATIC_MAINTENANCE WHERE MAINTENANCE_TYPE = 'MSGP' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ANY MSG GROUP' FROM OLTMS_STATIC_MAINTENANCE ORDER BY FIELD_NAME
